enb_long_title: Sixth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: The Friends of the Chair group met throughout the day to continue discussing the draft decision(s).

The creation of the financial issues group by President Pronk posed difficulty for the G-77/CHINA, who held that the financial issues relating to the decision(s) under UNFCCC Article 4.8 and 4.9 and Protocol Article 3.14 should not be discussed separately from action outlined by the decision(s).
Compromise was reached on sections of text on Article 3.14.
However, key decisions, such as whether there should be two separate decisions for Article 4.8 and 4.9 and Article 3.14 or one for both, remained unresolved.
Negotiations continued late into the evening.
